scripts.note1: we can't have nice things. prepublish also runs on npm install https://github.com/npm/npm/issues/6394
scripts.prePublish: ./node_modules/.bin/gulp gitPrep && npm prune && ./node_modules/.bin/dmn gen -f . && ./node_modules/.bin/doctoc README.md && ./node_modules/.bin/doctoc CONTRIBUTING.md && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add .npmignore README.md CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit -m'publish prep markdown & npmignore'; fi
